Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: yotam f
Reviews.Content: girlfriend searching flight rome ages finally found hotel online reading review sight secound decided didnt regret start arrived hotel staff realy plesent realy helpfull realy hotel realy city outside hotel 5 buss stop city metro basicly 8 days hotel recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Ideal place to stay in Rome”
Reviews.Author: MoveLikeJellyfish
Reviews.Content: cant sing praises hotel palace friend chance lastminutecom secret 4 hotel completely worth hotel city centre mentioned bus stop literally outside simply catch bus town takes 20 mins tip buy bus pass 1 euro checks paying read plenty reviews note youre flying fiumicino airport catch train station ponte galeria bus 808 stops outside hotel travel round city easy buses taking taxis isnt worth price hotel reception spacious modern completely renovated 6th floor top lift incredibly slow walk updown stairs slow pace beat lift pleasant roomy serviced daily fresh towels bedding tv lacking english channels honest watch tv rome films available price 10 euros isnt wide choice didnt bother toiletries available request forgotten complimentary shower shower caps bathroom replenished daily breakfast buffet style cakes pastries cereal yoghurt ham cheese bread eggs bacon doesnt restocked gone wide choice club sandwich evening dinner lunch enjoyable dont guests breakfast assume day reception helpful theyd recommend eat restaurant town pasta brilliant kept luggage storage checkout day saved lugging bags airport stay rome dont mind travelling bus recommend fantastic value money tips rome tours museums means skip sometimes incredibly lines youre tourist try pay colosseum dont pay 1520 euros vatican 3540 youre student card discounts top buses getting city hop onhop 25 euros 48hrs worth

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel - Modern, Comfortable and Clean! (miles out though)”
Reviews.Author: RREdinburgh
Reviews.Content: boyfriend booked hotel palace cheap deal lastminutecom secret hotel deal offer hotel chain dont advertise giving low price risk price 4 nights location easy access vatican city proved temptation plumped secret hotel obviously hotel palace … landed feet initially disappointed town 12km despite inconvenient it’s world town accessible bus runs 530am everyday stops outside hotel drops edge centro storico takes 20 30 minutes depending traffic isnt bad account hanging bus stop waiting isn’t timetable hope lucky estimate 15 20 mins day frequently night recommend getting hold bus map – available hotel recently renovated modern clean clinical interior feels minimalist little space age – functional it’s luxurious comfortable – beds strong showers adjusted air conditioning staff friendly fawning speak serviceable english buffet breakfast plenty options cereal bread cake tinned fruit yoghurt eggs bacon ham cheese complaint refilled ran butter gone muesli finished day replaced gripe getting palace ciampino airport fly fiumicino airport fairly direct route hotel flew ciampino bit complex course taxi time budget terravision bus outside departures termini central rome 4euros walk round corner bus stop 64 bus direction st peters takes town river tunnel stop tunnel bus stop direct hotel

Reviews.Title: “Large comfortable room, great location”

Reviews.Content: bad review stayed fantastic bed comfortable comfortable appointed lcd tv movie wifi package bit pricey shower ive hotel clean spacious buffet breakfast satisfying bar food pretty loved pizza 650 euros hotel 15 20 minute ride major attractions easy reach airport buses run frequently honestly paid ride bus train airport checks cheap ride bus 1 euro didnt change time train airport 8 euro short ride checked save money act didnt caught loved stay modern hotel city changed holiday inn prices probably staff friendly helpful public transport shuttle expensive 40 euro taxi airport 34 euro literally 30 minutes airport hotel train bus theres cheaper free arent restaurants walking distance hotel offer free shuttle local restaurants dinner hotel service

Reviews.Title: “For this country it's a good hotel...”
Reviews.Author: IonutIasi
Reviews.Content: spent 4 days hotel nice design inside nice people dont speak nice nice bad internet free expensive kingsize bed separate beds promise moved kingsize bed didnt forgot time thin walls able hear neighbor live partner cars street trough glass windows country italy hotel
